spec_data.Name: perl-Lingua-Preferred
spec_data.Description:
Many web browsers let you specify which languages you understand.
Then they negotiate with the web server to get documents in the best
language possible.  This is something similar in Perl.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:47:09 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl extension to choose a language
